jobDescription: Data Science User Experience Specialist Job Category:  Information Technology Department:  Enterprise Data Strategy (307) Location:  Los Angeles HQ, California, US Position Type:  Full Time Requisition ID:  601 DUTIES:The Data User Experience Specialist is responsible for supporting L.A. Care data science projects by leading the User Experience (UX) efforts of the Data Science Innovation team, which primarily consist of developing and maintaining the user interface of data science products.
